price: Subhana 'Llah Ametakasika Mwenyezi Mungu na hayo wanayo msingizia.
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu ametakasika na hizo sifa za kuemewa na za upungufu wanazo mzulia kuwa anazo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
